author: PlayStation
description:
METAL EDEN Demo - Out Now 

HYPER UNITS - get ready to dive into the adrenaline-fueled sci-fi world of METAL EDEN. Experience the first two missions of the game, featuring high-octane combat and futuristic parkour, with the free demo, available now on all platforms.  
 
METAL EDEN releases May 6 2025 on PlayStation. 

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rated Mature
title: Metal Eden - Demo Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012764

Wishlist Tour de France 2025 now!

A few weeks ago, we unveiled the new graphics engine for Tour de France 2025, marking its transition to Unreal Engine 5. Today, we're excited to share a brand-new trailer offering a sneak peek at the breathtaking landscapes and enhanced visuals that will bring the race to life like never before.

Experience the thrill of Tour de France 2025 on PlayStation 5 on June 5, 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games #tourdefrance2025 #tourdefrance
title: Tour de France 2025 - New Graphics Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009170

IXION, the acclaimed sci-fi city builder, is now on PlayStation 5.

With all new console specific UI, IXION combines city building, survival elements and exploration, into a thrilling space opera as you explore the stars. Propelled onwards through a perilous journey, you are the Administrator of the Tiqqun space station, charged with finding a new home for humanity.

Keeping the station sound and flying will require a deft hand and strategic thinking, as you are constantly pulled between maintaining hull integrity, bringing in new resources and managing power consumption.

What choices will you make when confronted with impending disaster? What will you discover out there in the dark?

#ps5 #ps5games #ixion
title: Ixion - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Get Ready to Riff Your Way to the Top of Hell's Stardom.

Rogueside is proud to announce Devil Jam, a hand-drawn visuals, Metal-themed survivor-like with beat-driven combat set in Hell. The game offers a unique 12-slot inventory system, allowing for near-infinite demonic builds.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Devil Jam - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist the game today: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013265

EcoGnomix is coming to PS4 and PS5 on April 29th, 2025

A quirky mix of turnbased roguelite mining and cozy city building mixed into one. Build a lively little city above, by looting mystical caves with a team of gnomes below! 

Use multiple runs to unlock upgrades and abilities to help your gnomes venture deeper into the dangerous underground as they build up their illegal mining operation.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4games #ps4
title: EcoGnomix - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
